name: Desert Vroom 2021
description:
Discover the last edition of the famous driving simulation franchise Desert Vroom™, in Desert Room 2021! Drive your truck across the desert and witness its breathtaking landscape. Will you be able to make your delivery on time? Be sure to avoid the obstacles in your way! You wouldn't want to commit an infraction.

Featuring:

  • Immersive 3D graphics offering astonishing landscapes
  • A precise physics simulation, it feels just like driving for real!
  • An on-scale map, to ensure dozens of hours of play session
  • The most majestic truck seen in any video-game
  • So desert, much vroom!

What they've been saying:

  • ”I never knew I needed this! I'm still not sure actually.” - PC Gaming Magazine
  • “Video game will never get more immersive than this.” - TruckBoy_2000
  • “Almost as great as Desert Vroom 2008!” - Gaming Test Today

Warning: Although the game as been thoroughly tested by our Q&A team, there's always a chance for you to encounter some bugs on your journey. If you stumble upon a behavior that seems off, please immediately close the game and alert no one else but our support, and our tireless developers will soon take care of it. We want only the best desert truck experience for you fellow gamers!

Controls

  • Arrows / AWSD: Drive
  • Mouse: Control camera
  • F11 / F: Fullscreen
  • ESC: Free cursor

Tip: If you find yourself stuck, try to fiddle with the physics. Maybe you'll break something, or find a path in an unexpected way!

Credits

Made for the Potat0s Jam 6, with the theme “The True Goal is Hidden” (“Le Vrai Objectif est Caché”).

Music and sounds has been realized by Koji : Soundcloud, Twitter
